data.title: Even Apple’s Biggest Fan Slashed Expectations
data.text: The bloodbath in the economy and the stock market has refused to let up. The news is the same as the day before, it’s just growing worse and coming from a lower and lower base.

data.title: The new MacBook Air is back at $999
data.text: With a new keyboard, double the storage and quad-core CPU options, the Air is back in a big way.

data.text: The coronavirus crash continues.

data.title: Apple's new 2020 MacBook Air left out a key upgrade for people working from home
data.text: Commentary: The outdated webcam on the new MacBook Air won't help people with all the video calls they're doing in 2020.

data.title: Apple Launches iPad Pro With 3D Scanning Tech
data.text: Apple unveiled a new iPad Pro which the company is billing as its most advanced tablet to date.

data.title: Apple unveils new iPad and MacBook Air, but skips iPhone launch
data.text: Apple on Wednesday made a surprise announcement of new versions of its iPad Pro, Mac Mini and MacBook Air devices, but stopped short of announcing the iPhone 9 it was expected to reveal this spring.

data.title: Apple unveils new products
data.text: In what may be the latest sign of how the coronavirus outbreak is upending the tech industry, Apple -- known for its splashy product launch events -- showed off new flagship devices in a virtual presentation to some journalists on Wednesday.

data.title: Coronavirus Lesson: Balance Sheets Matter
data.text: Companies with plenty of cash and little debt will be just fine.

data.title: Should Nonessential Retail Close Due to Coronavirus?
data.text: Some areas aren't giving them a choice.

data.title: Apple introduces new iPad Pro with AR camera and new MacBook Air with new keyboard
data.text: Yahoo Finance's Dan Howley breaks down the new products being released by Apple.

data.title: Apple Stock Slides As Bull Sees 'Dark Days Ahead' For iPhone Maker
data.text: Wall Street's biggest bull for Apple stock sees tough times ahead for the consumer electronics giant amid economic turmoil caused by the Covid-19 pandemic. He slashed his AAPL price target.

data.title: Apple announces new iPad Pros with keyboard trackpads incoming
data.text:
Apple Stores are closed the world over, so if you want to check out the new products, you’ll have to go to Apple’s website to do that.
Apple has announced a slew of new products today.

data.title: Apple brings back 'scissor' keyboards in latest MacBook Air
data.text: Apple Inc  launched an updated version of its MacBook Air on Wednesday, modifying keyboards on its laptop line that have faced criticism for typing-related problems.

data.title: 5 Recession-Resistant Tech Stocks to Buy Amid Coronavirus Scare
data.text: Coronavirus outbreak has heightened recession fears. Here are five recession-resistant technology stocks including Microsoft (MSFT) to beat COVID-19 induced recession woes.

data.title: Apple unveils iPad Pro with 3D scanner in major redesign
data.text: Top tablet uses tech normally found in self-driving cars as Apple attempts business-as-usual approach to pandemic

data.title: Should You Sell Apple Stock Right Now?
data.text: The coronavirus sell-off is presenting opportunities for long-term investors.

data.title: The MacBook Air gets an updated keyboard and souped-up specs, starting at $999
data.text: Apple just offered up a new version of the the MacBook Air with some souped up internals, including a 10th-generation Intel processor and double the storage. Honestly, the big news here for many is probably the updated keyboard, doing away with a couple of generations of misfires on that front.

data.title: Apple announces new iPad Pro
data.text: Apple has announced new iPad Pro models in a press release. In addition to better specifications, Apple is also releasing a new Magic Keyboard with backlit keys, a trackpad and a hinge that allows you to move the iPad freely.

data.title: Apple updates Mac Mini with more storage options
data.text: Apple today announced the Mac Mini will ship with more standard storage space. Starting at $799, the base model Mac Mini now ships with a 256GB SSD, up from 128GB previously.

data.title: Apple announces new iPad Pro with camera that can scan 3-D objects
data.text: Apple announced new 11-inch and 12.9-inch iPad Pros.

data.title: Apple target lowered at Wedbush after analyst factors in recession to fall iPhone forecasts
data.text: Wedbush analyst Daniel Ives cut his price target on Apple Inc.'s stock AAPL, +4.40% to $335 from $400 Wednesday after he ran his model through a stress test.

data.title: 3 Stocks to Buy When Others Are Fearful
data.text: The CBOE Volatility Index, or "fear index," is signaling that long-term investors should go shopping.
